name: TETRACHROMACY
description:
TETRACHROMACY

Game 5 of 12 in a weekly game challenge

Try and rack up the highest score by matching your color with the passing lasers. Every successfully escaped laser you will gain a point but if you go through a laser with a different color you're TOAST.

Left Arrow : Knudge Left and turn blue

Right Arrow : Knudge Right and turn green

Up Arrow : Knudge Up and turn red

Holding Pressed Arrow : Remain arrow's color

No Arrows : Turn white

My high score : 40
